It happens with Eclipse I200310081556 unziped over M3.

Slowliness of arrow keys is bug 44524.
The NPE happens in Debug land.

The stack trace indicates you have performed an evaluation - what was the 
evaluation you performed?

I don't remember of any evaluation in progress. I was working on Java
Perspective, and none of the debug views 'Variables', 'Expressions', 'Display'
was active.
When I switch to 'Debug Perspective', there is only one process in the 'Debug'
view, and that process is terminated.

The trace shows the Display action was invoked. Assigning to Luc for 
invesigation.
